wiiremotej.event
Class BBCombinedEvent

java.lang.Object
  java.util.EventObject
      wiiremotej.event.BBEvent
          wiiremotej.event.BBCombinedEvent
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable
public class BBCombinedEvent
extends BBEvent

Combined event for Nintendo (R) Balance Board (TM). Contains events returned from buttons and the mass sensors.

See Also:

Constructor Detail

BBCombinedEvent

public BBCombinedEvent(BalanceBoard source,
                       BBButtonEvent BEvt,
                       BBMassEvent MEvt)
Creates a new BBCombinedEvent from the given events. The events should not be null.

Parameters:
source - the BalanceBoard triggering this event.
BEvt - the button event of this combined event.
MEvt - the mass event of this combined event.
